function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination between different municipal entities leading to ineffective management of urban green spaces","Impact":"Deterioration of green spaces, increased risk of uncontrolled vegetation growth, and reduced public access to well-maintained outdoor areas","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels and decision-making processes between the involved municipal entities, and implement a centralized management approach for urban green spaces","Technologies":"Collaboration and project management tools, Geographic Information Systems (GIS) for spatial planning","People":"Public and local community, municipal officials, urban planners","Owner":"Municipal government, urban planning departments, environmental resources secretariat"},{"Description":"Insufficient maintenance and operation decisions for urban green spaces due to fragmented responsibilities","Impact":"Neglect of certain green spaces, uneven distribution of resources, and decreased overall attractiveness of urban areas","Mitigation":"Define clear roles and responsibilities for each municipal entity, establish performance indicators for maintenance, and implement a unified approach for resource allocation","Technologies":"Asset management software, IoT sensors for monitoring, mobile applications for reporting and tracking maintenance activities","People":"Maintenance staff, public park users, neighborhood residents","Owner":"Public Services Office, Environmental Resources Secretariat, Municipal maintenance departments"},{"Description":"Limited focus on green spaces within the Public Services office leading to neglect and underfunding","Impact":"Decline in the quality of green spaces, loss of biodiversity, and negative impact on community well-being","Mitigation":"Advocate for dedicated funding and attention to urban green spaces, integrate green space management into strategic plans, and raise public awareness about the importance of green spaces","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analytics for demonstrating impact, remote monitoring systems for vegetation health","People":"Local communities, environmental activists, municipal decision-makers","Owner":"Public Services Office, Environmental Resources Secretariat, Municipal government"}]}
